name: YouiDraw Logo Creator Image
summary: Learn about .YLC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: YouiDraw Logo Creator is a free, web-based program that allows you to create vector logos. You can create logos from scratch or use any of Logo Creator's many user-created templates to get started.

If you want to download an in-process logo design to your computer, so you can maintain a local copy of that logo, you can select File → Download to Local Disk. This saves your current logo design project as a YLC file.

instructions: You can open a YLC file in YouiDraw Logo Creator (Web). To do so, open Logo Creator in your web browser and select File → Open From Local Disk. Then, navigate to and open your YLC file.
After opening a YLC file in YouiDraw Logo Creator, you can select File → Export to convert the image to a PNG or JPEG file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
